headline: Masco (MAS) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of home-building design and manufacturing company Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) jumped 3.2% in the afternoon session after a broad market rally driven by renewed hopes for a Federal Reserve interest rate cut and an easing of trade tensions with China. The positive sentiment was sparked by a tame inflation report, with the Consumer Price Index (CPI) holding steady at 2.7% year-over-year.
